Literature.Title: Structure-activity relationship of mastoparan analogs: Effects of the number and positioning of Lys residues on secondary structure, interaction with membrane-mimetic systems and biological activity.
Literature.Author: Souza BM, Cabrera MP, Gomes PC, Dias NB, Stabeli RG, Leite NB, Neto JR, Palma MS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli CCT 1457(MIC=1µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 11775(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15422(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 13388(MIC=16µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis ATCC 10708(MIC=31µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CCT 2580(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CCT 6538(MIC=63µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=1µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 11733(MIC=1µg/ml),Streptococcus mutans AU159(MIC=16µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=125µg/ml),Bacillus thuringiensis ATCC 10792(MIC=125µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium CCT 5079(MIC=2µg/ml),Enterococcus hirae ATCC 10541(MIC=63µg/ml),Rhodococcus equi ATCC 25729(MIC=8µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 4698(MIC=1µg/ml)
